greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A (3/2,-1) Somos-4 sequence.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,-16).
formula: a(-n) = a(n-1) / 2^(2*n - 1) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Jan 06 2011
0 = a(n)*(+2*a(n+4)) + a(n+1)*(-3*a(n+3)) + a(n+2)*(+2*a(n+2)) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Sep 18 2014
a(n+4) = -16 * a(n) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Sep 02 2015
mathematica: a[ n_] := (-1)^Quotient[n + 2, 4] 2^(n - Mod[ Quotient[n + 1, 2], 2]); (* _Michael Somos_, Sep 18 2014 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 31 2010
